summary: This is a Bank of America affidavit and records production in response to a legal order (reference D082319000153, case 2019R01059) from the U.S. Attorney's Office. It certifies the authenticity and completeness of bank records produced for accounts covering January through August 2019, including statements, signature cards, checks, deposits, and offsets.

events.title: Bank Records Production Period
events.description: Bank of America produces records for multiple accounts covering the period from January 2019 through August 2019 in response to a legal order.

keyFacts: Bank of America produced bank records for the period January 2019 through August 2019 in response to a legal order from the U.S. Attorney's Office.
The records include statements, signature cards, checks, deposits, and offsets for multiple accounts.
The document is an affidavit from a Bank of America officer/custodian certifying the authenticity and completeness of the records production.
The legal order reference is D082319000153 and the court case number is 2019R01059.
The affidavit was notarized in Phoenix/Maricopa County, Arizona.
